resources:
HearingAid Select a Gender Male Female Other

Find a Quiet Place Before you Start the Test. Try to lessen the amount of noise around you.

You can turn on Do Not Disturb, so you donâ€™t receive notifications and calls during the Hearing Test.

Please Turn off Audio Effects such as Active Noise Cancellation as these may affect the accuracy of the test.

The test only takes ~ 5 minutes.

The tone will play automatically the first time and the frequency will increase automatically until you press \n \" Can Hear\" or \" Can\'t Hear\". The test will run for each ear, shown by the button color and headphone. Blue means active and Grey means inactive. Left ear first, then right. Press the Play button to play the tone and Press the Stop button to stop the test at any given time. Stopping the test will not save any test results. Can you hear the signal? Test History HelpPageActivity First Fragment Second Fragment Next Previous //Help Page Welcome to the Hearing Aid App! This app allows you to use it as a hearing aid better hearing quality. 1. Noise Suppression Mode Choose between On and Off using the radio buttons.\nOn: Noise suppression is active, reducing background noise.\nOff: Noise suppression is disabled. 2. Gain Control Gain adjusts the Volume. Slide the seek bar to the right to increase and to the left to decrease the volume. Use the START button to activate the Audio Playback (Hearing Aid) feature. Press the Stop button to stop it.
